Birthday Boy Abhimanyu Mithun Becomes First Karnataka Bowler To Take Hat-Trick In Vijay Hazare Trophy

Birthday Boy Abhimanyu Mithun Becomes First Karnataka Bowler To Take Hat-Trick In Vijay Hazare Trophy

Abhimanyu Mithun made history with a hat-trick in the Vijay Hazare Trophy final against Tamil Nadu. It also happens to be his 30th birthday and he finished with figures of 5/34.

BCCL

He's the first player to take a hat-trick in the summit clash and also first ever from Karnataka to do so.

A Hat-trick for Abhimanyu Mithun in the final over, becomes the first Karnataka bowler to take a hat-trick in #VijayHazare Trophy.

Tamil Nadu bowled out for 252 in 49.5 overs#KARvTN @paytm pic.twitter.com/A17K50jAxW — BCCI Domestic (@BCCIdomestic) October 25, 2019

His hat-trick victims were Shahrukh, Mohammed and M Ashwin. This is also the first time he has taken 5 wickets in an innings in the tournament.

Don't Miss 55.5 K SHARES 16.6 K SHARES 14 K SHARES 9.1 K SHARES

BCCL

It was top class bowling and he wad rewarded for sticking to a good line and length.

Will the selectors take notice? Let's wait and watch.

With Inputs From TNN.
